climbs.name: World on Fire
climbs.fa: Greg Miller, belayed by Meg Yingling, 4/19

content.description: A burly start getting into a v slot leads to easier offwidthing.
content.protection: Pro to 6" and a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location:
This is left of "

Little William

" on the same ledge.

climbs.name: Sweet Fists & Drill Bits
climbs.fa: Meg Yingling, belayed by Greg Miller, 4/19

content.description: Climb the slab to the steep fist crack.
content.protection: Pro to 4", 2 bolts, and a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location:
This is on the upper tier behind "

Crack of Life

."

content.description: Shelby's Crack is a left-angling crack of various sizes.
content.protection: Pro to 6" and a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location:
It is right of “

Crack of Life

.”

content.description:
Pitch 1: climb a black streak to a horn following the arete to the top.

Pitch 2:  climb fun slabbing straight above the belay.
content.protection:
P1: 4 bolts and a 2 bolt anchor.

P2: 4 bolts and a 2 bolt anchor.

Rap the route.
content.location: It is on the right side of the crag.

content.description:
Negotiate a short offwidth section to a handcrack in the groove. Extend your last piece, top out, and walk to the anchors for "

Shelby's Crack

".
content.protection: Pro to 6" and a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location:
Do the same start as “

Shelby’s Crack

”, but step right onto the ledge.

content.description: Climb a short crack to flake feature then straight up the slab, placing gear between bolts, to exposed pebble climbing up a blunt arete.
content.protection: Pro to a 0.75”, 5 bolts, and a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location:
Climb the first pitch of ‘

Little William

’. Then traverse the large ledge 20 feet left, and build an anchor (4-5” cams) or sling a boulder.

content.protection: Pro to 3" and a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location: It is in the center of the crag.

content.description: The crux comes right off the ground, then it is easy slab to the top. This makes for a good rap in approach if coming from the top of the wall.
content.protection: 2 bolts and a sling for the tree.
content.location: It is on the far left side of the crag.
